entries.description: Add a new alert for NodeTimeDrift.
Patch cilium v1.12 and v1.11 to latest patch releases (v1.12.9) (v1.11.16).
Do not try to watch `Cluster` resources on the master in `usersshkey-synchronizer` and use Seeds as correct source instead.
Fix a bug that lead to metering reports overwriting each other when used with multiple seeds. Report names now include a seed name prefix.
The MLA stack is now able to recover from a lost Grafana volume, properly recreating organizations for KKP projects.
Fix OOM on usercluster-controller by limiting the history of helm releases. This fix is critical if user-cluster is using Cilium >= 1.13.0 as CNI.
Initialize Machine Deployments without waiting for all cluster details to finish loading.
